audio_description: Today we will make Kolkata’s very famous, tasty, and aromatic biryani – Arsalan Chicken Biryani. To begin, let's first prepare its biryani masala. For that, take 2 teaspoons cumin seeds, 2 teaspoons white pepper—you can also use black pepper.

audio_description: Take two pinches or 1/8 teaspoon of orange food color. Mix everything together. Rub the color well onto the chicken. Now refrigerate it for marination for at least half an hour. This makes the chicken soft and helps the color soak in.

audio_description: —mix the potatoes in the masala. Once it starts boiling, reduce to low flame and cover it to cook for 15–20 minutes. After 20–25 minutes, once the potatoes are soft, drain the water and remove the potatoes. Save the leftover masala.
